title: Login Music - Can we get a soundtrack please?!
body:
I'm sure most people here probably don't care too much about this but I have been enjoying a LOT of the login music in the past year. I would be absolutely 110% willing to pay $20 for a soundtrack CD. Also, can you tell us the composers and artists involved in the music? I'd love to look into these people and discover some of their other work!

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey Six66Pounder,

Most of the music can be found on our [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends). Glad you enjoy!

[Here you go.](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLbAFXJC0J5GZHUtGea_zQR0OyD3UBuw9s)
The page here will be updated every time a new login is released. If you want to save the files to a disc or direct to your computer, use YouTube MP3.

Thanks, I actually have been doing this already. I just really wanted a legitimate version where I can throw some money at the hard workers! Plus, how cool would it be to have an official case for it and everything haha.
